name: Antitype
description:
“Antitype’s clever design shines bright, delivering a tricky word puzzler in a minimalist package” — PocketGamer

“A word game that stands out from the crowded marketplace” — AppAdvice

“A double-whammy word puzzler… a devious combo!” — TouchArcade

“Simple but beautiful… absorbing… addicting.” — MacStories

Antitype is a game all about opposites. With a clue and your knowledge of the alphabet, you'll change opposing letters to decipher each pair of opposite words.

- 900 levels range from simple to extremely difficult
- Plan your moves wisely - every level can be solved!
- Each level is uniquely shuffled so every attempt has its own solution
- macOS version is fully-unlocked with unlimited hints included!
- Sync progress between macOS and iOS devices
- Beautifully-clean, colorful aesthetic
- Minimalist in style, yet full of complexity
- Quick gameplay - play for a minute, an hour or longer!
